name: pbl-evidence-tracker
description: Check a doc for a certain thing

scripts.build-gas-utils: cd ../utilities-gas && npm run build-dev && cp -R build ../evidence-tracker-gas/build/utilities-gas
scripts.build-ts-utils: cd ../utilities-ts && npm run build && cp -R build ../evidence-tracker-gas/build/utilities-ts
scripts.build-utils: npm run build-gas-utils && npm run build-ts-utils
scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && npm run build-utils && cp -r src/** build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run push

author: Chris Shaw
